SELECT e.id, e.crte_time, t.name as visitName, e.visit_id, t.in_no, t.bed_name, e.item_name, e.spec, e.price, e.split_price, e.curr_unit_code curr_unit_code, e.unit_code unit_code, e.split_unit_code split_unit_code, e.num, e.split_num, abs(e.num) showNum, e.dist_time FROM phar_in_wait_receive e join inpt_visit t on t.hosp_code = e.hosp_code and t.id = e.visit_id join inpt_cost c on e.cost_id = c.id and e.hosp_code=c.hosp_code WHERE e.hosp_code = #{hospCode} AND e.is_back = '1' AND e.status_code='3' AND c.back_code='1'
and (t.name like concat('%',#{visitName},'%') or t.bed_name like concat('%',#{visitName},'%'))
and t.in_no like concat('%',#{inNo},'%')
AND e.dist_time >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND e.dist_time < date_add(STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d'),interval 1 day)
order by e.crte_time desc
